Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to term limits for elected officials.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City Charter in relation to providing that any changes to term limits for elected officers must be submitted for the approval of the electors.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing that any changes to term limits for elected officers must be submitted for the approval of the electors.

Items.Title: A Local Law to establish a Charter Revision Commission to draft a new or revised City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish a Charter Revision Commission to draft a new or revised City Charter.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State legislature to adopt legislation amending the State Municipal Home Rule Law (MHRL) to give the City the authority to provide in its Charter that any change in the City’s term limits law must be subject to voter referendum.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Any change in the City’s term limits law must be subject to voter referendum.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to term limits for elected officials.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to term limits for elected officials.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City Charter in relation to providing that any changes to term limits for elected officers must be submitted for the approval of the electors.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Providing that any changes to term limits for elected officers must be submitted for the approval of the electors.

Items.Title: A Local Law to establish a Charter Revision Commission to draft a new or revised City Charter.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish a Charter Revision Commission to draft a new or revised City Charter.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State legislature to adopt legislation amending the State Municipal Home Rule Law (MHRL) to give the City the authority to provide in its Charter that any change in the City’s term limits law must be subject to voter referendum.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Any change in the City’s term limits law must be subject to voter referendum.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City Charter in relation to providing that any changes to term limits for elected officers must be submitted for the approval of the electors.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing that any changes to term limits for elected officers must be submitted for the approval of the electors.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Oddo, James, Barron, Weprin, Brewer, Garodnick, Liu, Lappin, Avella, Koppell, Jackson, Katz, Fidler, Reyna, Mark-Viverito, Vann, Palma, Stewart, de Blasio, McMahon, Eugene, Mealy, White, Comrie, Martinez, Gonzalez, Gerson, Iginizio and Gentile
